title: A proclamation containing His Majesties gracious pardon and indemnity to the commoners within the shires of Argile and Tarbat
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library
Additional imprint statement: This may be Reprinted at London, R.L.S. the 28th. of September, 1686. By D. Mallet.
At end of text: Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the sixteenth day of September, 1686.
